SEARCH
Package info.kgeorgiy.ja.sitkina.implementor

Class Implementor

java.lang.Object
info.kgeorgiy.ja.sitkina.implementor.Implementor
All Implemented Interfaces:
Impler, JarImpler
public class Implementor extends Object implements JarImpler
Class for generating implementations of classes and interfaces. All generated methods return getDefaultValue(Class) of return type. Has main(String[]) to run from console.

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Entry point to run from console. Supported options: [Canonical name Class.getCanonicalName() of class to implement] -jar [Canonical name Class.getCanonicalName() of class to implement] [Name of result .jar file]
      Parameters:
      args - command line arguments.

    • resolveToken

      private static Class<?> resolveToken(String tokenName) throws ImplerException
      Resolves type token with specified name. Throws ImplerException if resolve fails.
      Parameters:
      tokenName - name of type token.
      Returns:
      Class Object Class representing type token with specified tokenName.
      Throws:
      ImplerException - if token with specified tokenName cannot be found.

    • implement

      public void implement(Class<?> token, Path root) throws ImplerException
      Description copied from interface: Impler
      Produces code implementing class or interface specified by provided token.

      Generated class' name should be the same as the class name of the type token with Impl suffix added. Generated source code should be placed in the correct subdirectory of the specified root directory and have correct file name. For example, the implementation of the interface List should go to $root/java/util/ListImpl.java

      Specified by:
      implement in interface Impler
      Parameters:
      token - type token to create implementation for.
      root - root directory.
      Throws:
      ImplerException - when implementation cannot be generated.

    • implementJar

      public void implementJar(Class<?> token, Path jarFile) throws ImplerException
      Description copied from interface: JarImpler
      Produces .jar file implementing class or interface specified by provided token.

      Generated class' name should be the same as the class name of the type token with Impl suffix added.

      Specified by:
      implementJar in interface JarImpler
      Parameters:
      token - type token to create implementation for.
      jarFile - target .jar file.
      Throws:
      ImplerException - when implementation cannot be generated.

    • createClass

      private String createClass(Class<?> token) throws ImplerException
      Creates string with interface/class implementation.
      Parameters:
      token - type token of interface/class to create implementation for.
      Returns:
      Java code of implementation.
      Throws:
      ImplerException - if Class Object represented by this type token cannot be implemented.

    • check

      private void check(Class<?> token) throws ImplerException
      Checks that type can be implemented. Throws ImplerException if it cannot be implemented.
      Parameters:
      token - type token of type to be checked.
      Throws:
      ImplerException - if type cannot be extended/implemented.

    • addHeader

      private void addHeader(StringBuilder stringBuilder, Class<?> token)
      Appends header line with package info of type to stringBuilder.
      Parameters:
      stringBuilder - stringBuilder to append to.
      token - type token to extract package info

    • getConstructor

      private Constructor<?> getConstructor(Class<?> token) throws ImplerException
      Gets non-private constructor Constructor of specified type. If type represents an interface, null is returned.
      Parameters:
      token - type token to get constructor from.
      Returns:
      Constructor of type.
      Throws:
      ImplerException - if type token represents a class with no non-private constructors.

    • addClassDef

      private void addClassDef(StringBuilder stringBuilder, Class<?> token, Constructor<?> constructor) throws ImplerException
      Appends class definition of generated inheritor to stringBuilder. Constructor may be extracted using getConstructor(Class).
      Parameters:
      stringBuilder - stringBuilder to append class definition to.
      token - type token of type to generate inheritor of.
      constructor - non-private constructor of type. If null, constructor is not generated, default will be used.
      Throws:
      ImplerException - if type cannot be extended/implemented.

    • getMethodsFromParents

      private List<Method> getMethodsFromParents(Class<?> token)
      Gets all non-private methods of type and all its superclasses and superinterfaces.
      Parameters:
      token - type token of type to get methods from.
      Returns:
      List of Method objects, representing found methods.

    • getMethodsToImplement

      private List<Method> getMethodsToImplement(Class<?> token)
      Gets methods of type that must be implemented in its inheritors.
      Parameters:
      token - type token of type to get methods from.
      Returns:
      List of Method objects, representing found methods.

    • addConstructor

      private void addConstructor(StringBuilder stringBuilder, Class<?> token, Constructor<?> constructor) throws ImplerException
      Appends implementation of constructor of given type to stringBuilder.
      Parameters:
      stringBuilder - stringBuilder to append constructor to.
      token - type token of type from which constructor was extracted.
      constructor - constructor to be added.
      Throws:
      ImplerException - if at least one of constructor parameters types has private access.

    • addMethod

      private void addMethod(StringBuilder stringBuilder, Method method) throws ImplerException
      Appends method implementation to stringBuilder.
      Parameters:
      stringBuilder - stringBuilder to append method to.
      method - method to be added.
      Throws:
      ImplerException - if at least one of method parameters types or return type has private access.

    • addEntity

      private void addEntity(StringBuilder stringBuilder, int modifiers, String header, Class<?>[] parameterTypes, Consumer<StringBuilder> exceptionsAdder, Function<String,String> getBody) throws ImplerException
      Appends entity (constructor or method) implementation to stringBuilder.
      Parameters:
      stringBuilder - stringBuilder to append entity to.
      modifiers - entity modifiers, should be extracted by entity.getModifiers()
      header - start of entity declaration up to opening bracket excluding it
      parameterTypes - array of entity parameter types
      exceptionsAdder - consumer that adds exceptions to specified stringBuilder
      getBody - function that generates entity body using its parameters
      Throws:
      ImplerException - if at least one of entity parameters types or return type has private access.

    • addParams

      private String addParams(Class<?>[] paramTypes, StringBuilder stringBuilder) throws ImplerException
      Appends parameters with types and generated names to specified stringBuilder and returns parameter names separated by commas. Name of parameter is "p" and its number in parameter types array.
      Parameters:
      paramTypes - array of parameter types to generate function signature
      stringBuilder - stringBuilder to append to.
      Returns:
      String consisting of parameter names separated by commas.
      Throws:
      ImplerException - if at least one parameter type has private access.

    • addExceptions

      private void addExceptions(Class<?>[] exceptionTypes, StringBuilder stringBuilder)
      Appends exception types separated by commas to specified stringBuilder.
      Parameters:
      exceptionTypes - array of exception types to add.
      stringBuilder - stringBuilder to append to.

    • addModifiers

      private void addModifiers(StringBuilder stringBuilder, int modifiers)
      Appends modifiers (public/protected/private and static) to specified stringBuilder.
      Parameters:
      stringBuilder - stringBuilder to append to.
      modifiers - entity modifiers, should be extracted by entity.getModifiers()

    • getDefaultValue

      private String getDefaultValue(Class<?> clazz)
      Returns default value of given type. Default value for boolean is "false", for void is "", for all other primitive type is "0", in other cases "null" is returned.
      Parameters:
      clazz - type token of type to get default value for.
      Returns:
      String representation of default value for specified type.

    • writeToFile

      private Path writeToFile(String clazz, String packageName, String className, Path root) throws ImplerException
      Writes interface/class implementation to file.
      Parameters:
      clazz - generated implementation.
      packageName - name of package of generated class.
      className - name of generated class, may be obtained by getClassName(Class).
      root - path to directory where to put result file.
      Returns:
      path to directory with result file.
      Throws:
      ImplerException - In case of problems with writing to result file.

    • writeToJar

      private void writeToJar(String clazz, String packageName, String className, Path jarFile, String classPath) throws ImplerException
      Writes interface/class implementation to .jar file.
      Parameters:
      clazz - generated implementation.
      packageName - name of package of generated class.
      className - name of generated class, may be obtained by getClassName(Class).
      jarFile - path to target .jar file.
      classPath - classpath of generated class, may be obtained by getClassPath(Class).
      Throws:
      ImplerException - In case of problems with compiling code or writing to result file.

    • compile

      private static void compile(String root, List<String> files, Charset charset) throws ImplerException
      Compiling java files.
      Parameters:
      root - classpath of given files.
      files - files to compile.
      charset - charset to be given to compiler.
      Throws:
      ImplerException - If compilation fails.

    • getClassPath

      private static String getClassPath(Class<?> token)
      Returns classpath for given type.
      Parameters:
      token - type token of type to get classpath of.
      Returns:
      Classpath for given type.

    • deleteDirectory

      private void deleteDirectory(Path dir) throws IOException
      Deletes all content of specified directory including it.
      Parameters:
      dir - directory to delete.
      Throws:
      IOException - If deleting fails.

    • getClassName

      private String getClassName(Class<?> token)
      Returns class name of implementation of type.
      Parameters:
      token - type token of type to be implemented.
      Returns:
      Implementation simple class name.

    • newLine

      private void newLine(StringBuilder stringBuilder, int level)
      Appends new line and offset to specified stringBuilder. Offset is a space repeated 4 * level times.
      Parameters:
      stringBuilder - stringBuilder to append to.
      level - offset to make.
